name: Four Wins
overview: A board game conversion of Connect 4 created by Thomas Koncina and Thorsten Koytka and published in Magic Disk 64 1988/03. FOUR WINS is the C64 version of the well-known game VIER GEWINNT. However, with FOUR WINS there is the possibility to measure one's intelligence against that of the computer. For those of you who are not familiar with the rules of WINNER, here is a brief description: The aim of the game is to line up four of your own stones. In contrast to TIC TAC TOE, what matters here is foresight and intelligence. In some cases it takes the computer a little long to think.
